entry.data:
RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF VERY LIGHT DRIZZLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

RAIN LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40
